name: TechModi Inc
description:
TechModi is an offshore software outsourcing company based in India. TechModi develops custom applications for devices management, control and integration to back end ERP and Legacy systems. We have implemented software projects involving BizTalk, our case study and many other custom platforms. We provide solutions in many languages such as C, C#, PHP, JAVA and .NET on top of any host platform.
We can also put your applications on the Web using web servers, middleware and client side user interface development. We have proven capability working with various systems and can help integrate any data with backend systems. For more information please visit www.techmodi.com.
